divs: sighting detailsi had just walked out on the porch as i usually do (i watch the skies all the time)when off to the westsouthwest i noticed a very bright and big light there is a picture or two from the video i took, i know planes when i see em and this was not a plane ,anyway i watched it for about ten minutes,if anyone here knows what mineral springs is then ten minutes it would be passed usand headed toward waxhaw, so i called my brother, he's not home but his wife answered the phone, i said walk outside and look at the sky told hger where to look but that didnt help..so i said look around you'll know it when you see it shortly afterward she said whoa. welli kept checking the skies and around 20 minutes later it came back i recored all this, and i'm sorry the camera is shakey but there was nothing that i could steady it to or on but i did the best i could. http:\\cid-e691fca860ae375b.skydrive.live.com\self.aspx\x-files\ufo|_%20mineral%20springs%209-18.divx
